name: Polarities
description:
NB! You need at least one controller in order to play this game.

Polarities is a 2-4 player local PvP multiplayer brawler. In this game your objective is to push or pull your opponent into the many hazards that can be found in each location. So switch polarity, utilize power-ups and send magnetic objects to stun your opponent! Then you will get the upper hand and be the last armadillo standing!!

This Game includes:
  • 4 playable characters
  • 2 distinct battle locations
  • Power Ups to help you get the upper hand
  • Magnetic Durians?!
  • Tourney Mode
  • Time Mode
  • Stock Mode
  • Multiple Control Schemes and support for one player on a keyboard if you don't have more than one gamepad
  • A blend between 2D sprites and 3D objects
  • An original soundtrack

Enjoy this high paced, action packed game!!

NB! This game is local multiplayer only! It does not support singleplayer or online multiplayer (except for Steam Remote Play).

Note that this game was made by a student company in approximately 9 months. With some time lost to COVID-19 as well. We hope you can forgive any short comings this game might have. Thank you for being interested in our game!
